casebody.data:
South Carolina

Chancery Elizabeth Smith and others, Complainants v. Hannah Smith and others, Defendants

It is ordered on Motion of Mr. Hugh Rutledge Sollicitor for the Defendants that a Commission to take their Answer or Answers to the Complainant’s Bill in this Suit do issue directed to Samuel Wragg, Job Roth-*605mailer, Paul Trapier, Joseph Brown and Robert Gibb impowering them or any five of them to take the same.

October 29th 1772. Wm Burrows Master in Chancery
